title: The Scarlet Spear [1954 - UK] Kenya adventure
description:
The Scarlet Spear (1954 - UK, USA)

Adventure
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047452/


Filmed at Kenya with a cast consisting mostly of Kenyan actors

In colonial Kenya, District Commissioner Jim Barneson and his new bride Christine, try to persuade Morasi, newly-crowned chief of the Masai, to abandon the age-old ritual of proving himself worthy to rule by slaying a rival tribe member, thus earning him a "scarlet spear."


Video: XviD, 400x304, 29.970 fps, 1156 Kbps, 01h17m04s
Audio: MP3, 48000 Hz, joint stereo, 98 kbps

VHSRip low quality, English audio, no subtitles
